name: The Brick
description:
This is a puzzle game where you get to play as your favorite character: "The Brick". Move to the tune of the music and solve the challenges ahead!

Controls:

  • Space - Move to current direction
  • Esc - Exit

Team:

  • Afonso Leitão - Level design and music composer
  • Ivo Duarte - Artist
  • Ricardo Subtil - Programming and level design
